Here is a list of all struct and union fields with links to the structures/unions they belong to:

- a -

  • acquired_xa_resource : xta_mysql_xa_resource_t , xta_postgresql_xa_resource_t
  • act_rsrmgr_config : xta_xa_resource_s
  • already_opened : xta_transaction_s

- b -

  • bqual_length : xid_t

- c -

  • client_status : xta_transaction_s
  • commit_suspended : xta_transaction_s
  • config_digest : lixa_job_u
  • connection : xta_mysql_xa_resource_t , xta_postgresql_xa_resource_t
  • context : lixa_iface_s

- d -

  • data : xid_t
  • dynamic : xta_xa_resource_s

- e -

  • enlisted_tx : xta_xa_resource_s

- f -

  • fields : lixa_job_u
  • flags : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • formatID : xid_t

- g -

  • gtrid_length : xid_t

- i -

  • iface : xta_acquired_xa_resource_t

- l -

  • local_ccc : xta_transaction_s
  • lssr : xta_mysql_xa_resource_t , xta_postgresql_xa_resource_t

- m -

  • mutex : xta_transaction_manager_s

- n -

  • name : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • native : xta_xa_resource_s

- r -

  • raw : lixa_job_u
  • rsrmgr_config : xta_xa_resource_s

- s -

  • separator : lixa_job_u
  • source_ip : lixa_job_u
  • std : lixa_iface_s

- t -

  • terminator : lixa_job_u
  • transactions : xta_transaction_manager_s
  • type : lixa_iface_s

- v -

  • version : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s

- x -

  • xa_close_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_commit_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_complete_entry : xa_switch_t
  • xa_end_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_forget_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_open_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_prepare_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_recover_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_resource : xta_acquired_xa_resource_t , xta_mysql_xa_resource_t , xta_native_xa_resource_t , xta_postgresql_xa_resource_t
  • xa_rollback_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_start_entry : xa_switch_t , xta_iface_s
  • xa_xid : xta_xid_t
  • xid : xta_transaction_s
  • xta : lixa_iface_s
